==Vietnamese==

===Pronunciation===
{{vi-pron}}

===Etymology 1===
{{vi-etym-sino|飛|to fly; to gallop}}.

====Verb====
{{vi-verb}}

# {{lb|vi|of a|horse}} to [[gallop]]
#: {{ux|vi|Ngựa '''phi'''.|The horse gallops.}}
# to [[flee]]; to [[travel]] very quickly
#: {{ux|vi|'''Phi''' nhanh về nhà kẻo tối.|Hurry home before it gets dark.}}
# to [[lance]] {{gloss|to throw in the manner of a lance}}
#: {{ux|vi|'''phi''' dao găm|to throw a dagger}}

===Etymology 3===

====Verb====
{{vi-verb}}

# to [[stir-fry]] (an [[onion]], [[scallion]], or clove of [[garlic]]) before preparing a dish
#: {{ux|vi|'''Phi''' tỏi rồi mới bỏ [[rau muống]] vào.|Stir-fry the garlic before adding in [[water spinach]].}}
#: {{ux|vi|'''Phi''' hành để nấu [[nước chấm]].|Stir-fry the onion to make dipping sauce.}}
